problem.markdown:
1. All the functionality of a union can be performed by a structure? (x) True ( ) False
2. A structure can be defined inside a structure (x) True ( ) False
3. Default values can be given to the members of the structure : ( ) True (x) False
4. Arrays can be a part of the structure? (x) True ( ) False
5. One can define an array of structure variables? (x) True ( ) False
problem.p: 1. All the functionality of a union can be performed by a structure?
2. A structure can be defined inside a structure
3. Default values can be given to the members of the structure :
4. Arrays can be a part of the structure?
5. One can define an array of structure variables?
